title: Avitus - ⭐・roles
Avitus - ⭐・roles
html:
**What are the different community roles I can encounter?**

• @Spartan 
This role is earned by those who complete all on-chain tasks, joining the Avitus on-chain army as elite Spartans - our most dedicated movers.

•@ChuckleWeaver
 Reserved for the creative minds who consistently produce original and engaging memes for Avitus.

• @Chronicler
 Given to those who excel in spreading the Avitus story through detailed threads, articles, and blogs.

•@Seeker
 Are the shakers of our server, keeping the community dynamic by engaging in events and activities.
 
•@Outreach Advocate
This role belongs to those who stay in the loop, attend discord AMAs, and amplify our project on social media.

•@Sage  
An exclusive role automatically granted to server boosters, acknowledging their vital contributions to the community. 

•@Early Movers
This role is for the early contributors of Avitus, who have played a crucial part in building a strong foundation for our long-term success.

•@Movers  
Welcome aboard! This role is for all verified members who keep on engaging to help us maintain a vibrant and welcoming community.

title: Avitus - ⭐・roles
html:
**👥 Interaction Roles 👥 **

Connect, support each other, and help us build the best community.

•@Talky Get Level 5 by engaging in general chat

•@Talker Reach level 10  by engaging in general chat

•@Talkiest Reach level 20 by engaging in general chat

title: Avitus - ⭐・roles
html:
**🎯 Reaction Roles 🎯** 

Stay attentive in the announcements channel and mark your presence by reacting to updates. The more you react, the higher you climb!

•@Reactive Granted upon reacting to 30 messages achievement.

•@More Reactive Granted upon reacting to 100 messages achievement.

• @Most Reactive Granted upon reacting to 200 messages achievement.

•@Super Reactive Granted upon reacting to 500 messages achievement.

• @Hyper Reactive Granted upon reacting to 1000 messages achievement.

title: Avitus - ⭐・roles
Avitus - ⭐・roles
html:
**🎰 Channel Guide 🎰**

#📢・announcements
 This is where you'll find real-time announcements straight from the team, keeping you up-to-date on the latest developments.

#📰・community-news
 This channel is your go-to for staying connected with the community's pulse, where you’ll get the inside scoop on upcoming events, community plans, and more. 

#😅・meme-movers
  A fun, image-only space where members can share their creative memes and artwork related to our project.

#⚡・galxe-help-desk
 This channel is dedicated to resolving any issues you might encounter with our on-chain or off-chain quests on Galxe. 

#📺・event-announcements
  This channel provides all the details you need to join in on the server's fun and ensure you never miss our weekly events.
